sourcesContent: /* eslint-disable global-require */ /* eslint-disable import/no-dynamic-require */ import React from "react" import { GrLocation } from "react-icons/gr" import "../../../../style" import { Img, Button, PropCard, PrompInfo, Title, Location, LocationText, PropText, Line, CardTitle, } from "../styles/PrompCard" // eslint-disable-next-line react/prop-types const PromCard = ({ source, title, price, city, days, introduction, slug }) => ( <> <CardTitle>{title}</CardTitle> <CardTitle>${price}</CardTitle> {city} {`Duration: ${days} days`} {introduction} ) export default PromCard
